alert.note: Alert for Big Belt, Bridger and Castle Mountains; Elkhorn and Boulder Mountains; Gates of the Mountains; Helena Valley; Little Belt and Highwood Mountains; Meagher County Valleys; Upper Blackfoot and MacDonald Pass (Montana) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued March 11 at 2:59AM MST until March 11 at 11:00AM MST by NWS GreatFalls
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 11 AM MST THIS MORNING... * WHAT...Snow. Additional snow accumulations up to two inches. Winds gusting as high as 45 mph. * WHERE...A portion of central Montana. * WHEN...Until 11 AM MST this morning. * IMPACTS...Plan on slick or snow covered road conditions. Widespread blowing snow could significantly reduce visibility to less than one mile at times. Snow drifting onto the roadway could also make roads difficult to navigate in spots.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling. The latest road conditions can be obtained by calling 5 1 1 or visiting the MDT Road Report website.
